mutants.code:
def reverse_string(string):
    char_list = list(string)
    start = 1
    end = len(char_list) - 1
    while start < end:
        (char_list[start], char_list[end]) = (char_list[end], char_list[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    reversed_string = ''.join(char_list)
    return reversed_string

    reversed_string = ''.join(char_list)
